english.segment1: What can I do. How can I live. To show my world. The treasure of Jesus
english.segment2: What will it take. What could I give. So they can know. The treasure He is
english.segment3: And if I can sing. Let my song. Be full of His glory. If I can speak. Let my words be full of His grace. And if I should live or die. Let me be found. Pursuing this prize. The One that alone satisfies. The treasure of Jesus
english.segment4: And if I can sing. Let my songs. Be full of His glory. If I can speak. Let all my words be full of His grace. And if I should live or die. Let me be found. Pursuing this prize. The One that along satisfies. The treasure of Jesus.
